revision.text:
{{Infobox military conflict | conflict = Battle of Cádiz (1640) | partof = the [[Franco-Spanish War (1635–1659)]] | image = | caption = | date = 21 July 1640 ([[Julian calendar]]) | place = [[Bay of Cádiz]] | coordinates = | map_type = | latitude = | longitude = | map_size = | map_caption = | territory = | result = Minor tactical French victory | status = | combatant1 = {{flagicon|Spain|1506}} [[Spanish Empire]] | combatant2 = {{flagcountry|Kingdom of France}} | commander1 = [[Jerónimo Gómez de Sandoval]] | commander2 = [[Jean Armand de Maillé-Brézé]] | strength1 = 10 [[galleon]]s,
1 patache{{harvnb|Duro|1898|p=263}} | strength2 = 24 galleons,
12 [[fireship]]s | casualties1 = 1 galleon burned,
1 patache sunk{{harvnb|Duro|1898|p=265}} | casualties2 = Unknown | casualties3 = | notes = }} {{Campaignbox Franco-Spanish War (1635-1659)}} The '''Battle of Cádiz (1640)''' was a naval battle in the [[Franco-Spanish War (1635-1659)]], which took place on July 21, 1640, when a French squadron under [[Jean Armand de Maillé-Brézé]] attacked a Spanish convoy coming from the Americas. The attack occurred just in front of the coast of [[Cádiz]].
Armand de Breze employed a hitherto unknown tactic to attack the [[Spanish treasure fleet|Spanish convoy]] from both sides. The Spanish lost a [[galleon]] and a small vessel but the convoy completed its journey and delivered most of its cargoes including its silver bullion. French losses are unknown. ==Notes== {{Reflist}} == References == *{{Citation |last=Duro |first=Fernandez Cesáreo |title=Armada española desde la Unión de los Reinos de Castilla y de León |volume=4 |location=Madrid |publisher=Est. tipográfico "Sucesores de Rivadeneyra" |year=1898 |pages=[https://archive.org/stream/armadaespaolade03durogoog#page/n286/mode/1up 263], [https://archive.org/stream/armadaespaolade03durogoog#page/n288/mode/1up 265] |url=https://archive.org/stream/armadaespaolade03durogoog#page/n9/mode/2up|language=es}} ==Further reading== *{{Citation|url=http://www.probertencyclopaedia.com/F_BATTLE_OF_CADIZ.HTM |title=Battle of Cadiz |publisher=[http://www.probertencyclopaedia.com/ The Probert encyclopaedia of Warfare] |accessdate=April 2012 |deadurl=yes |archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20120402214259/http://www.probertencyclopaedia.com/F_BATTLE_OF_CADIZ.HTM |archivedate=2012-04-02 |df= }} {{coord|36|29|39|N|6|13|1|W|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Cadiz (1640)}} [[Category:Conflicts in 1640]] [[Category:Battles involving France]] [[Category:Battles involving Spain]] [[Category:Naval battles of the Franco-Spanish War (1635–59)]] [[Category:1640 in Europe]] [[Category:History of Cádiz]] [[Category:1640 in Spain]]
